channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-16309] TestDefaultCompactSelection.testCompactionRatio is flaky
item.description: The aged major compaction condition is not stable.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

+1, patch looks good and seems to solve the flakiness for me.
(maybe instead of the sleep we can do injectEdge() to move the time forward)

Use EnvironmentEdgeManager to fix the issue. Matteo Bertozzi Can you please try this patch to see if it works for you?

Thanks.
+1 on v1. patch looks good to me and I did 20 runs with it and the test have not failed.

Good. Will commit after the pre-commit report.

Thanks.

-1 overall
